thread.title: Oman Convention & Exhibition Centre launches day delegate packages for 2016
thread.title_full: Oman Convention & Exhibition Centre launches day delegate packages for 2016

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Oman Convention & Exhibition Centre launches day delegate packages for 2016
text:
Oman Convention & Exhibition Centre launches day delegate packages for 2016 Oman Convention & Exhibition Centre launches day delegate packages for 2016 Details Category: Arenas and Conference Centres   16:15 Supporting organisers in their endeavours at the OCEC (Oman Convention & Exhibition Centre), the Day Delegate Packages offer a wide range of services and features via a seamless booking process including food, beverage, Free Wi-Fi and parking, and a personal Event Manager to ensure that everything is taken care of. 
Both the Half Day Package (OMR 20++/ person) and the Full Day Package (OMR 25++/ person) include morning and afternoon refreshment breaks, Chef’s Selection Lunch with seasonal ingredients, standard AV, free Wi-Fi and parking; plus traditional Arabic Qahwa (coffee) and Halwa, a traditional sticky-sweet made of sugar, cardamom, saffron and rose water, to welcome guests to their hospitality suite. The hospitality suites offer comfortable seating for smaller board meetings or corporate meetings for up to 100 delegates in theatre style, with the option of also being used for dinners and private networking events. Larger groups of 300 delegates can be accommodated in the Centre’s Confex Set up in Hall 1 and when the OCEC is fully open there will be over 55 different meeting space options to choose from.
